name: VI. “DRIFTING IN SPACE”
description:
6/8 from “Nightmares” collection.
It’s a collection created to celebrate Halloween that revives the most common and darkest nightmares that haunt the human being. 8 collectible card amulets that explain the most terrifying fears and give protection to those who have them.

Description of the piece:
Dreaming about being floating in space is related to your state of mind. Maybe you feel like you don’t have direction in life. 
You have nothing to tie you to and you are free to move wherever you want. However, because you don’t really have a purpose or goals, you just float aimlessly. 
Being lost and adrift is a sign that you lack direction in your life. You are floating up and down, ebbing with the flow of your emotions. You let your own and others' emotions guide your actions. Therefore, you tend to make pointless moves that usually get you nowhere.

MP4 - 1157x1600px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/nightmares
